title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-1.6 - Preemption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-1.6 - Preemption

State Regulations
(a) Except where the Department has approved
a local law or ordinance under section 1.7 of this Subpart, any local law or
ordinance that is aimed at establishing or implementing a petroleum bulk
storage program, is preempted. (b) The Department retains sole authority to administer and enforce this Part with
respect to any public authority created under the Public Authorities Law, any

State agency, any major facility, or any facility with a hydrant
system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
613-1.6

Adopted, New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 10/11/2015

Amended

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
